item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0839; 01:36PM; 767 W 97th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EY3DA9; Vermont Vista; KNOCKDOWN: 28 firefighters extinguished the fire in 39 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters conducted a coordinated roof operation and interior fire attack to locate the seat of the fire within building's common attic. They had to work their way through all four units to locate the stubborn fire while crews conducted salvage operations to protect the interior/belongings in the units. The fire was prevented from extending down into the living space. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E15 E226 E264 E266 E57 E64 RA266 SQ21 T26 T64 T66; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0839; 12:57PM; 767 W 97th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EY3DA9; Vermont Vista; One story building with four bungalows (they have a common attic) with an attic fire. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E264 E266 E57 E64 RA266 T64 T66; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1689; 08:11PM; 8108 S Hoover St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VwtwOp; Vermont Knolls; KNOCKDOWN: 22 firefighters made quick work and extinguished the fire in only 10 minutes with no injuries reported. They contained the fire to the unit of origin, defending both the adjacent units and the attic from fire extension. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E221 E233 E264 E33 E57 RA257 RA857 SQ21 T21 T33 T64; CH9; 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1689; 08:01PM; 8108 S Hoover St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VwtwOp; Vermont Knolls; Two story, garden style apartment building with fire showing from one unit on the 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. One additional task force requested (not reflected in this alert).; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E264 E57 RA257 T33 T64; CH9; 15; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0657; 10:43AM; 2135 S Veteran Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UvsUHF; West Los Angeles; KNOCKDOWN: 18 firefighters located and extinguished the attic fire in 17 minutes with no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 59; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC9 E292 E37 E59 RA59 T92; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0657; 10:26AM; 2135 S Veteran Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UvsUHF; West Los Angeles; One story, single family dwelling with light smoke showing upon LAFD arrival. Firefighters entered the structure and finding it clear, made access into the attic where they located heavy smoke. Firefighters are continuing in the offensive mode.; FS 59; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC9 E292 E37 E59 RA59 T92; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1863; 11:30PM; 10720 W Moorpark St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pBG2OR; #TolucaLake; *Corrected Address* Twenty-six LAFD firefighters, operating in defensive mode, extinguished flames consuming a vacant one-story single-family home in 42 minutes. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E289 E76 E86 RA60 RA86 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1863; 10:48PM; 10800 W Moorpark St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XXf18a; #TolucaLake; Vacant single-family home with fire showing.; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E289 E76 E86 RA86 T89; CH9; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0718; 11:38AM; 876 S Norton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3B52VQd; #Koreatown; Twenty-four firefighters located fire in the wall of the kitchen on the first floor of a two-story home and extinguished the flames in 18 minutes. Smoke filled the first floor, as the occupants escaped with their pets. Two residents and their family canines were evaluated for smoke inhalation *as a precaution*, but were found to be in good health and further care was not needed. No reported injuries. Cause yet to be determined.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E226 E229 E26 E29 EM5 RA26 RA52 RA6 T29; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0718; 11:20AM; 876 S Norton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3B52VQd; #Koreatown; Two-story single-family home with fire in the wall. Offensive mode. Two patients are being treated for smoke inhalation.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E226 E229 E26 E29 E52 EM5 RA26 RA52 RA6 T29; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange
